QUANT(6D)                                             QUANT(6D)





NAME
       quant - quantify an image

SYNOPSIS
       quant inimage outimage nlevels

DESCRIPTION
       quant  quantifies  an image to have n levels. The output
       image will only have nlevels different pixel values.

SEE ALSO
       thresh(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                 QUANT(6D)
